name: シンプル Nosub
css:
@-moz-document domain("www.nosub.tv") {
body > div.wrapper > div.content > div.margin_bottom.p > div.content_single,
#lianyue_share,
body > div.wrapper > div.header > div.top_logo > h1 > a > img,
body > div.wrapper > div.content > div.margin_bottom.p > div.related_img > h3,
body > div.wrapper > div.header > div.switch > a,
body > div.wrapper > div.content > div.margin_bottom.p > div.info,
body > div.wrapper > div.content > div.margin_top,
body > div.wrapper > span,
body > div.wrapper > div.notice,
body > div.wrapper > div.footer,
body > div.wrapper > div.content > div.margin_bottom.p > span,
body > div.wrapper > div.content > div.margin_bottom.p > div.mukioplayer > div.ad_player,
#lianyue_single_header_ad,
#imobile_adspotdiv1,
#imobile_adspotdiv2,
#imobile_adspotdiv3,
#lianyue_top9_header_ad,
#g_floating_area1,
#g_floating_area2,
#lianyue_cat_footer_ad,
body > div.wrapper > div.content > div > div.sidebar.slide_js > div.widget_text > div > div
{display:none !important;}

body > div.wrapper > div.header,
body > div.wrapper > div.header > div.menu
{height:25px !important;}

body > div.wrapper > div.header
{
width:100% !important;
border:0px !important;
}

body > div.wrapper > div.content > div > div.content_710.cat.cat_sub > div
{width:100% !important; position: relative; right:200px  !important;}

#navi
{width:100% !important; position: relative; top:-53.5px; right:100px  !important;}
}
